effect.short: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.
effect.full: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.

flavorTexts.text:
Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to
grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of
Grass-type Pokémon.
